revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Weapon}} '''A_FHammerThrow'''
(''no parameter'')
Checks if special1 is set not 0. If so, and the player has a sufficient amount of ammo, it fires a {{Class|HammerMissile}}. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|FWeapHammer}} and derived classes.
